ing.item: Flowers, make sure there clean and have NO herbicides

directions.step:
Pour water over flowers let sit overnight. Strain and discard flowers, add lemon juice and pectin. Bring to boil, add sugar. Boil for 1 1/2 minutes. Pour in to sterilized jars and seal.
NOTE; Try using leaves in soups as a thickener (like you would use Okra). Blossoms are great in salads too. Posted to Kitmailbox Digest by House of Engraving <caengrav@aimnet.com> on Apr 3, 1997
